DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study investigate influence mild moderate liver impairment pharmacokinetics , safety select pharmacodynamic parameter BI 1744 CL comparison control group normal hepatic function single orally inhaled administration BI 1744 CL Respimat® Inhaler .
DOC.brief_title: Single Dose BI 1744 CL Patients With Mild Moderate Hepatic Impairment Compared Subjects With Normal Hepatic Function
